Class Descriptions

java.lang.Object
  com.bws.jdistil.core.util.Descriptions

public class Descriptions
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides a locale specific description for a given value.

- Bryan Snipes

Method Detail

getDescription

public static java.lang.String getDescription(java.lang.String value,
                                              java.util.Locale locale)
Returns a locale specific description for a given value. The original value is returned if a locale specific description is not available.

Parameters:
value - Value to describe.
locale - Locale.
Returns:
String Locale specific description or original value if no description exists.
